title: Matching bases
text: $$\log_{5}\left(x^2\right)$$ and $$\log_{5}\left(81\right)$$ have the same log base. $$\log_{5}\left(x^2\right)$$ and $$\log_{5}\left(81\right)$$, so we can see it as $$x^2=81$$

title: Value of $$b$$ in $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$
text: $$x^2=81$$ has two solution $$x=9$$ and $$x=-9$$. Given $$\log_{a}\left(b\right)$$, $$b$$ can not be negative. Therefore we can omit the negative answer. $$x=9$$ is the only solution for the given equation.
